newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.Africa Capital Partners buys computer firm stake.
newsitem.headline: S.Africa Capital Partners buys computer firm stake.

text.p: Private equity managers Capital Partners announced on Tuesday that its South African Private Equity and Capital Growth funds had acquired a minority interest in Computer Configurations Group.

It said in a statement that the transaction placed a value of more than 60 million rand on computer hardware distributor Computer Configurations which would be listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange in the first half of next year.

Computer Configurations is the sole distributor of U.S.-based Corollary multi-processing systems and is the third largest supplier in the multi-processing market after IBM (International Business Machines) Corp Hewlett Packard.
